attributes.additional_details: School is  not fun for young people
attributes.background: Maby make no school on Friday or ban school

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It's not clear if you want the Government to end all state education, or reduce the time children spend in school.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Require schools to make Friday a part of the school weekend: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597715
